content:
To Whom it Concerns,
I, Robert Fernandez, the father of Gail Houser and Vicki Martinez and father-in-law of Brad
Martinez, hereby declare my intention to occupy the dwelling space at 518 N. Stoneman Avenue,
Alhambra, CA. 91801.
I intend to move to the aforementioned address and reside there for a minimum of twelve months.
I declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of California that the foregoing is
true and correct. Executed on Tuesday, March 4, 2025, in Alhambra, California.
Sincerely,
Bobert Hernandy
Robert L. Fernandez
